CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both polymers have good thermal stability with onset decomposition temperatures with 5% weight loss at 313-320 ° C .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymers |

So, the valid entities in the paragraph are "Polymers".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymers |

I have removed the unnecessary entities "Both" and "with" from the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both polymers have good thermal stability with onset decomposition temperatures with 5% weight loss at 313-320 ° C .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| thermal stability |
| onset decomposition temperature |
| 5% weight loss |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Property Name" entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| thermal stability |
| onset decomposition temperature |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to material properties:

* "good" (this is an adjective modifying the noun "stability")
* "decomposition" (this is a process, not a property)
* "% weight loss" (this is a quantity, not a property)
